import React from 'react' import '../../css/components/chat_group/bottomSidebar.scss' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faChevronDown } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function BottomSidebar({currentUser}) { console.log(currentUser) return ( <>

{currentUser? currentUser.pseudo : 'loading'}

) } export default BottomSidebar
